name: delore
description: Detect, locate and repair C/C++ vulnerabilities.

delore.disableByDefault.description: Set whether user wants to disable DeLoRe without completely disable it in Extensions panel.

delore.toggleLocalization.description: Set whether the Localization Model is enabled or not.

delore.toggleRepairation.description: Set whether the Repairation Model is enabled or not.

delore.localInstallationDirectory.markdownDescription: Set virtual Python environment, install required packages download pre-training data for each chosen model. Extension will check the existance of this directory and create one if it doesn't exist.

markdownEnumDescriptions:
User can use custom model. In order for the extension to be able to use it, please specify #delore.detectionModel.pathToCustomModule and #delore.detectionModel.pathToCustomPythonBinary
**NOTE**: After `Custom` is being set, #delore.detectionModel.workingEnvironment is set to `Local` regardless of its current display value.
DeLoRe sets up a Python virtual environment specified at #delore.localInstallationDirectory, installs required packages and downloads chosen models to your machine.
DeLoRe sends request to a remote server that is being maintained by the publisher and retrieves data.

delore.detectionModel.pathToCustomModule.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the module of Detection Model. Extension will check the existance of the module. Only applies when #delore.detectionModel is set to `Custom`.

delore.detectionModel.pathToCustomPython.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the Python binary to run Custom Detection Model. If it's a binary from Python virtual environment, run `which python` after activation. Extension will check the existance of the binary. Only applies when #delore.detectionModel is set to `Custom`

delore.detectionModel.optionalParameters.markdownDescription: A list of parameters for Detection Model's configuration. Refers to #delore.detectionModel to check the documentation of current chosen AI model.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Refer to [LineVD's GitHub Repository](https://github.com/davidhin/linevd) for more details.

User can use custom model. In order for the extension to be able to use it, please specify #delore.localizationModel.pathToCustomModule and #delore.localizationModel.pathToCustomPythonBinary. 
**NOTE**: After `Custom` is being set, #delore.localizationModel.workingEnvironment is set to `Local` regardless of its current display value.
DeLoRe sets up a Python virtual environment specified at #delore.localInstallationDirectory, installs required packages and downloads chosen models to your machine.
DeLoRe sends request to a remote server that is being maintained by the publisher and retrieves data.

delore.localizationModel.pathToCustomMod.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the module of Localization Model. Extension will check the existance of the module. Only applies when #delore.localizationModel is set to `Custom`.

delore.localizationModel.pathToCustomPyt.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the Python binary to run Custom Localization Model. If it's a binary from Python virtual environment, run `which python` after activation. Extension will check the existance of the binary. Only applies when #delore.localizationModel is set to `Custom`

delore.localizationModel.optionalParamet.markdownDescription: A list of parameter for Localization Model's configuration. Refers to #delore.localizationModel to check the current chosen AI model's docs.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Refer to [VulRepair's GitHub Repository](https://github.com/awsm-research/VulRepair) for more details.

User can use custom model. In order for the extension to be able to use it, please specify #delore.repairationModel.pathToCustomModule and #delore.repairationModel.pathToCustomPythonBinary
**NOTE**: After `Custom` is being set, #delore.repairationModel.workingEnvironment is set to `Local` regardless of its current display value.
DeLoRe sets up a Python virtual environment specified at #delore.localInstallationDirectory, installs required packages and downloads chosen models to your machine.
DeLoRe sends request to a remote server that is being maintained by the publisher and retrieves data.

delore.repairationModel.pathToCustomModu.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the module of Repairation Model. Extension will check the existance of the module. Only applies when #delore.repairationModel is set to `Custom`.

delore.repairationModel.pathToCustomPyth.markdownDescription: Set the path point to the Python binary to run Custom Repairation Model. If it's a binary from Python virtual environment, run `which python` after activation. Extension will check the existance of the binary. Only applies when #delore.repairationModel is set to `Custom`

delore.repairationModel.optionalParamete.markdownDescription: A list of parameter to config Repairation Model. Refers to #delore.repairationModel to check the current chosen AI model's docs.

delore.disableLanaguages.description: By default, Delore will check vulnerabilities for all supported languages. Set the list of exception languages that don't get checked.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
